titleStmt.title: A new declaration of the Lords and Commons in Parliament, concerning the execution of the militia, 20 June, 1642. As also concerning a writ sent to the high sheriffe of Essex, by His Majestie for the publishing of his late proclamation to forbid all his loving subjects to raise, march, muster, or exercise by vertue of any order or ordinance of both houses of Parliament. / Ordered by the Lords and Commons, that this be forthwith printed. ; H. Elsyng cler. Par. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Elsynge, Henry, 1598-1654.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
